entry.title: WIND WARNING, Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -1.4Â°C

Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 12:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

Visibility: 19 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:20 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 10:20 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:20 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
